rules_text:
When Aozaki Aoko enters the battlefield if she was cast from your hand take an extra turn after this one.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if the last turn was your turn exile Aozaki Aoko and return her to the battlefield transformed.
special_text2:
At the beginning of your upkeep if it wasn’t your turn last turn exile Aoko, Redshifted and return her to the battlefield.
[+1]: Aoko, Redshifted deals damage to any target equal the number of card in your hand.
[0]: Exile any number of cards from the top of your library then put that many loyalty counters on Aoko, Redshifted.
[-10]: Take an extra turn after this one.
[-10]: Take an extra turn after this one.
